documents.document: #quotes Whenever there is a hard job to be done I assign it to a lazy man; he is sure to find an easy way of doing it.
Warriors take chances. Like everyone else, they fear failing, but they refuse to let fear control them. Ancient Samurai saying
A fool might be counted wise if he kept his mouth shut.AmericanProverb
You're never beaten until you admit it. George S. Patton
My great concern is not whether you have failed, but whether you are content with your failure. Abe Lincoln
#quotes You have to have doubts. I have collaborators I work with. I listen and then I decide. That's how it works.
#quotes We must be prepared to face our responsibilities and be willing to use force if necessary.
Before you can win a game, you have to not lose it. Chuck Noll, ex-Pittsburgh Steelers Coach
The most vital test of a mans character is not how he behaves after success, but how he sustains defeat. Raymond Moley
Make failure your teacher, not your undertaker. Zig Ziglar
Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving Albert Einstein
#quotes People with clear, written goals, accomplish far more in a shorter period of time than people without them could ever imagine.
#quotes Sandwich every bit of criticism between two thick layers of praise.
#quotes I knew I was going to be a journalist, and that was it.. full stop.
#quotes Keep your sales pipeline full by prospecting continuosly.Always have more people to see than you have time to see them.
A cheap thing doesn't lack defect, nor an expensive thing quality. Afghan Proverb
People who are unable to motivate themselves must be content with mediocrity, no matter how impressive their other talents. Andrew Carnegie
Snowflakes are one of nature's most fragile things, but just look at what they can do when they stick together. Vesta Kelly
#quotes The essential question is not, "How busy are you?" but "What are you busy at?" "Are you doing what fulfills you?"
How do I work? I grope Albert Einstein
#quotes The interesting thing is how one guy, through living out his own fantasies, is living out the fantasies of so many other people.
In the business world, everyone is paid in two coins: cash and experience. Take the experience first; the cash will come later. H. S. Geneen
Arrogance is a kingdom without a crown.AmericanProverb
#quotes Why is it that with all the information available today on how to be successful in small business, so few people really are?
As a small businessperson, you have no greater leverage than the truth. John Greenleaf Whittier
#quotes With some exceptions, the wrong people are running U.S. companies. It's been that way for years, and it hasn't gotten much better.
What counts is not necessarily the size of the dog in the fight - it's the size of the fight in the dog. Dwight D. Eisenhower
To speak ill of anyone is to speak ill of yourself. Afghan Proverb
A business absolutely devoted to service will have only one worry about profits. They will be embarrassingly large. Henry Ford
#quotes Every man who is high up loves to think that he has done it all himself; and the wife smiles, and lets it go at that.
Anger dwells only in the bosom of fools. Albert Einstein
One's mind has a way of making itself up in the background, and it suddenly becomes clear what one means to do. A. C. Benson
A wolf's pup will grow into a wolf even though it be raised among men. Afghan Proverb
Pride is no substitute for a dinner. Ethiopian Proverb
Lonely men seek companionship. Lonely women sit at home and wait. They never meet. Abe Lincoln
A nickel will get you on the subway, but garlic will get you a seat.AmericanProverb
"Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up." - Thomas A Edison
#quotes You've got to seize the opportunity if it is presented to you.
#quotes A friendship founded on business is a good deal better than a business founded on friendship.
Just go out there and do what you've got to do. Martina Navratilova
Only a life lived for others is a life worth while. Albert Einstein
He who lives with an ass, sounds like an ass. Ethiopian Proverb
"Today is your day! Your mountain is waiting. So... get on your way." - Dr Seuss
Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there. Bo Jackson
#quotes You know you are on the road to success if you would do your job, and not be paid for it.
#quotes I think we're having fun. I think our customers really like our products. And we're always trying to do better.
#quotes What matters is where you want to go. Focus in the right direction!
In this life we get only those things for which we hunt, for which we strive, and for which we are willing to sacrifice.George Matthew Adams
Minds are like parachutes - they only function when open. Thomas Dewar
A human learns how to talk early, but how to keep silent late.AmericanProverb
Striving for success without hard work is like trying to harvest where you haven't planted - David Bly
A beautiful face is a letter of recommendation. American Proverb
#quotes Don't quack like a duck.. soar like an eagle.
Hot heads and cold hearts never solved anything. Billy Graham
If you love life dont waste time for time is what life is made up of. Bruce Lee
After every darkness is light. Afghan Proverb
Don't let your ego get too close to your position, so that if your position gets shot down, your ego doesn't go with it. Colin Powell
#quotes Encouraged people achieve the best; dominated people achieve second best; neglected people achieve the least.
I never teach my pupils; I only attempt to provide the conditions in which they can learn. Albert Einstein
The leader who exercises power with honor will work from the inside out, starting with himself. Blaine Lee
Setting an example is not the main means of influencing others; it is the only means. Albert Einstein
#quotes The big secret in life is that there is no big secret. Whatever your goal, you can get there if you're willing to work.
When a fool is cursed, he thinks he is being praised. Afghan Proverb
Your premium brand had better be delivering something special, or it's not going to get the business. Warren Buffett
Achievement is largely the product of steadily raising one's levels of aspiration... and expectation. Jack Nicklaus
#quotes I am brave, but I take a view. It is an educated view. I am careful. I am not reckless.
We are afraid to care too much, for fear that the other person does not care at all. Eleanor Roosevelt
The most important persuasion tool you have in your entire arsenal is integrity. Zig Ziglar
#quotes The best job goes to the person who can get it done without passing the buck or coming back with excuses.
"If at first you don't succeed, try try again." - W C Fields
#quotes You've got to seize the opportunity if it is presented to you.
#quotes The harder you fall, the higher you bounce.#quotes The man who wakes up and finds himself famous hasn't been asleep.
It often requires more courage to dare to do right than to fear to do wrong. Abe Lincoln
"When the going gets tough the tough get going." - Joseph P Kennedy
#quotes I think my idea of retirement might be to one day work a 40-hour week.
#quotes The three great essentials to achieve anything worth while are, first, hard work; second, stick-to-itiveness; third, common sense.
#quotes Don't be too timid and squeamish about your actions. All life is an experiment.
Success is not built on success. It's built on failure. It's built on frustration. Sometimes its built on catastrophe. Sumner Redstone
A harvest of peace is produced from a seed of contentment.AmericanProverb
#quotes Making good decisions is a crucial skill at every level.
The real glory is being knocked to your knees and then coming back. That's real glory. That's the essence of it. Vince Lombardi
The work an unknown good man has done is like a vein of water flowing hidden underground, secretly making the ground green. Thomas Carlyle
If you call a tail a leg, how many legs has a dog? Five? No, calling a tail a leg don't make it a leg. Abe Lincoln
A good remedy for anger is delay. AmericanProverb
Time is our most valuable asset, yet we tend to waste it, kill it, and spend it rather than invest it. Jim Rohn
Better understated than overstated. Let people be surprised that it was more than you promised and easier than you said. JIM ROHN
No one knows what the dawn will bring. Ethiopian Proverb
He who wants to barter, usually knows what is best for himself. Ethiopian Proverb
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. Eleanor Roosevelt
Mitt Romney
#quotes A happy man is too satisfied with the present to dwell too much on the future.
#quotes To reach a great height a person needs to have great depth.#quotes No bird soars too high if he soars with his own wings.
A bow too much bent will break. American Proverb
#quotes When I started the business, I hardly went home. I became very driven about work and about my career.
No person will make a great business who wants to do it all himself or get all the credit. Andrew Carnegie
Whatever you are, be a good one. Abe Lincoln
Singleness of purpose is one of the chief essentials for success in life, no matter what may be one's aim John D. Rockefeller.
#quotes Unless a man undertakes more than he possibly can do, he will never do all that he can.
#quotes The measure of a man is the way he bears up under misfortune.
Adversity is the stuff that shows whether you are what you thought you were.AmericanProverb
